visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: 'Monthly Average Rainfall', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color (#003366) for the axis labels and titles, with a font size of 14px. Data series: The data series should include monthly average rainfall data for a year, with the series name 'Rainfall'. Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue (#ADD8E6) to dark blue (#003366) for the series. Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray (#F5F5F5), add a legend at the bottom of the chart, and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The x-axis represents the months of the year, and the y-axis represents the rainfall in millimeters. The axis labels and titles are styled with a dark blue color and a font size of 14px. The data series includes monthly average rainfall data, with the series named 'Rainfall'. The series color is a gradient from light blue to dark blue. The chart background is set to a light gray, and the legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart. The chart margins are set to 50 pixels on all sides to ensure proper spacing.
